Chrome Extensions

Chrome Extensions

Jun 7, 2016

Chrome Extensions and drop downs really are easy to setup. Here I provide two boilerplates and a lightning talk slideshow, so you can get started building your own extension in just a few minutes.

Intro to Chrome Extensions

GitHub: https://github.com/J-Roel/chrome-app-ext-boilerplate-gschool Here are some good tutorials and references to look through:

https://developer.chrome.com/apps/app_codelab_basics

http://www.sitepoint.com/create-chrome-extension-10-minutes-flat/

http://tutorialzine.com/2010/06/making-first-chrome-extension/

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15873904/adding-complex-html-using-a-chrome-content-script

https://developer.chrome.com/extensions/manifest
